a.n: Game 3: Kevin Durant's performance for the ages powers Warriors

p.k: Kevin Durant scored a career playoff-high 43 points, draining a long 3-pointer in the final minute to cap his magnificent performance, and the Warriors beat LeBron James and the Cleveland Cavaliers 110-102 in Game 3 of the NBA Finals to move within a victory of a sweep, their second straight title and third championship in four years.
